channel.title: [advice!] First Model From Scratch, WITH PIX :D
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-27235512.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-27235528.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-27235617.png[/img]
mmk well just cause i h8 bein flamed bout sht, i started trying with meta, and made these from scratch, prob not positioned right but oh well, ikno i messed up on the making it 3d ALOT, i had trouble making the 2d model basically just widen to 3d so i could work from there, but it didnt work out too well, it left a bunch of flaws and these small rectangles etc.
I posted this for the soul purpose of advice and help, idc for u nerd flamers cause if thats what ur life career is, ur doing a good job, i hope u feel proud, now for all of u who care, advice pl0x :P
[epic edits] k well i just forgot, i made ALOT of faces lmfao, more than i should have, i kno ;[ but i r a tart atm with all this
- Colours r dull atm, no detail rlly, i just need advice for the shape texture etc, not colours.
[credits] all teh ppl who flamed me for recolours, woulnt have made me think of starting with meta uhm the ppl's tuts i used for the tools, i did every thing bymyself ACCEPT THE LEARNING OF THE TOOLS o.o, eyes nd finger action ;]
if it fails beyond anything, just say " it failz" k? it avoids the flaming

item.title: [advice!] First Model From Scratch, WITH PIX :D
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

time of rune:

Nice, PLEASE keep doing models from scratch! Rep++!

uhm WOWZ o.o didnt think id get rep for this, also ak, he meant torag hammers attack animation should b used for these

Read full topic

item.title: [advice!] First Model From Scratch, WITH PIX :D
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:276072”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=364609.msg2767377#msg2767377 date=1240891900]
besides the misplaced verticies, its pretty good. if you can fix them, itll look great
[/quote]
well m8 the section mite not fail I going to post some models soon as well but when I do it tell me what you think 100% not what you think people wanna read.

ontopic looks purtty nice I could see these in a private server use thammers for the animation btw.[/quote]first ive never herd of thammers and wat do you meen by “for the animation”?

Read full topic
